ValidationRule.description: SFDC-13699, Added extra condition as a part of SFDC-18867
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY), OR(ISCHANGED( Status ) , ISCHANGED( EffectiveDate ) ), Id = Account.MSP_First_Order__c, EffectiveDate != Opportunity.CloseDate, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Draft")), Quote_Business_Group__c = "Barracuda MSP" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Order Start Date needs to be synced with the Opportunity's Closed Date. Please check the "Sync Order Start Date (MSP)" on the Order to sync the dates.
